Title: The Lizzie Borden Chronicles
Actors: Christina Ricci, Clea DuVall, Cole Hauser, Bradley Stryker, Dylan Taylor, Jeff Wincott, Jessy Schram, Jessy Schram
Plot: Fictionalized account of actual events and people surrounding Lizzie Borden after her controversial acquittal of the double murder of her father and stepmother in 1892.
